channel.title: party on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in party on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Second to last lesson with Sweets Party Attendants
item.description: 21:26 Wednesday 13 February 2019 JST Sweets Party Attendants had their second to last lesson with me today. The mood was both somber and joyful; it has been great working with them over the years.

item.title: the pizza is back there
item.description: 13:33 Saturday 18 March 2017 JST Ooops! From the time we were on the way up the hill (talking about getting pizza) to the time we headed down the hill, we forgot to get the pizza.

item.title: party
item.description: 23:28 Thursday 15 December 2016 JST After the lesson we went to Ozeki, a new restaurant owned by Sarupapa’s friend. Sarupapa has been working there for a few weeks now. Great food and umeshu and dessert! And of course great company; so glad everyone gets along so well.

item.title: Fun New Year's party at aunts house
item.description: ##21:10 Friday 02 January 2015 JST## Fun times! Lin’s uncle was able to solve Level 10 of Say Cheese after drawing out a map of the possible moves.

item.title: Party at JB School
item.description: ##03:11 Monday 15 December 2014 JST## Fun party yesterday! Interesting group games which I hadn’t seen before. Two people listen as the remaining people (in two groups) shout in unison two similar words, which the listeners try to understand. So we on team A shouted COPY while team B shouted COFFEE. The listeners hear “KA EE” (and try to sort out what the teams were shouting). Other word pairs: CONVERSATION, CONSERVATION; ELEGANT, ARROGANT; WORK, BOOK (I think; I was on the listening side of that one).

item.title: Pretty fun party
item.description:
##16:39 Wednesday 10 December 2014 JST## I’ve seen this truck each time I come to the lessons in Fukuura:
##20:26 Wednesday 10 December 2014 JST## The party was fun; lots of conversation, plus an emcee up front leading some pre-planned competitive games, then a raffle and bingo. People mostly stood around tables covered in drinks, candy, snack foods, tangerines, and some more substantial food, including 焼きそば plus おでん. Games included a mini version of sumo wrestling, where the participants were butt-to-butt on a chair cushion surrounded by mats.

item.title: New Year
item.description: (transcribed from Book Two of my diary) 9:20AM January First 1992. (Wednesday) We had our party last night - let me get everyone to sign: signatures skipped A whole slew of people came to the party. I learned everyone’s name. Let me get them all down here: Devin, Adam, Caleb (The original members (Remind me to tell you about Smelg)) Sarah, Tanya, Shannon, Bryan, Mike, John, Greg, Keith, who knows… I’ll have pictures.

item.title: party
item.description: 7:50AM Morning New Year's Eve 1991 (transcribed from Book Two of my diary) We're here. We got here at about 2AM & we all stayed up for probably 2 hours talking about programming & music and listening to music. Looking out the window, I see the sky is entirely gray. The ocean is about 150 or 200 yards away (wrong 50 yards only) It's now 11AM or so. I went to the beach and got some cool shells.
